title: George Soros
summary: George Soros[lower-alpha 1] HonFBA (born György Schwartz, August 12, 1930)[1][2] is a Hungarian-born American[lower-alpha 2] billionaire investor and philanthropist.[8][9] As of March 2021, he had a net worth of US$8.6 billion,[10][11] having donated more than $32 billion to the Open Society Foundations,[12] of which $15 billion have already been distributed, representing 64% of his original fortune, making him the "most generous giver" (in terms of percentage of net worth) according to Forbes.[13]
